title: [Snyk] SNYK-DEBIAN13-APT-5675173 in apt@3.0.3
description:
## Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature

**Severity:** low
**Package:** apt@3.0.3
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/Dockerfile`

**CVSS Score:** 3.7  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 150/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2011-3374](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2011-3374)

**Fix:** No automatic fix available. Review manually.

### Details
## NVD Description
**_Note:_** _Versions mentioned in the description apply only to the upstream `apt` package and not the `apt` package as distributed by `Debian`._
_See `How to fix?` for `Debian:13` relevant fixed versions and status._

It was found that apt-key in apt, all versions, do not correctly validate gpg keys with the master keyring, leading to a potential man-in-the-middle attack.
## Remediation
There is no fixed version for `Debian:13` `apt`.
